column none -- Column data with no JSON settings
column none --black Column data with no JSON settings but black option
column none --index=1,--headers=1 Column data with no JSON but index and header options
column none --index=1,--headers=1,--scattered=-1 Column data with no JSON but index, header and scattered options
column none --bg=gold,--size=22,--width=1000 Column data with no JSON but bg, width and size options
column none --stroke=5,--width=800 Column data with no JSON but width and stroke options
column none --opacity=.5,--stroke=5,--width=800 Column data with no JSON but opacity, width and stroke options
column none --ymax=50 Column data with no JSON but ymax option
column columns-ticks-index -- Column data with ticks and index
big columns-ticks-index -- Big data in columns with ticks and index
little columns-ticks-index -- Little data in columns with ticks and index
row rows-ticks-index -- Row data with ticks and index
posneg columns-ticks-index -- Positive and negative data with ticks and index
posneg columns-ticks-index --sortx Positive and negative data with ticks and index with sortx
posneg columns-ticks-index --xmin=-0.5 Positive and negative data with ticks and index, xMin of -0.5
bipolar columns-ticks-index -- Bipolar data in columns
bipolar rows-ticks-index -- Bipolar data in rows
plot plot -- Plot test in columns
plot plot --rows Plot test in rows
shapes shapes -- All shapes
trig trig -- Trig curves
trig trig --opacity=.3 Trig curves with opacity
trig trig --dashed=-1 Trig curves with dashed lines
trig trig --showpoints=-1,--xmin=80,--xmax=100 Trig curves with data points from 80...100
trig trig --showpoints=-1 Trig curves with data points
trig trig --showpoints=-1,--distance=50 Trig curves with sparse data points
trig trig --showpoints=-1,--distance=0 Trig curves with close data points
trig trig2 -- Clipped trig curves
z none --colour=red,--stroke=15,--show=blade Blade shape
z none --colour=red,--stroke=15,--show=circle Circle shape
z none --colour=red,--stroke=15,--show=diamond Diamond shape
z none --colour=red,--stroke=15,--show=shuriken Shuriken shape
z none --colour=red,--stroke=15,--show=square Square shape
z none --colour=red,--stroke=15,--show=star Star shape
z none --colour=red,--stroke=15,--show=triangle Triangle shape
